snippet: Mike Francesa and Christopher Russo, known for their longtime WFAN sports-talk radio show, will appear March 30 in a live-broadcast event.
abstract: Sportscasters Mike Francesa and Christopher Russo will reunite for Mike and the Mad Dog Reunion Show, one-night performance to be broadcast live from Radio City Music Hall as benefit for children’s charity Garden of Dreams Foundation; tickets for show sold-out within 24 hours of release, demonstrating enduring popularity of former WFAN radio sports-talk duo.
lead_paragraph: Mike Francesa and Christopher Russo, known for their longtime WFAN sports-talk radio show, will appear March 30 in a live-broadcast event.

headline.main: Mike and the Mad Dog Rev Up for a Radio City Reunion
headline.print_headline: Brash Radio Duo Rev Up for Reunion

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Mike and the Mad Dog (Radio Program)
